channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Harris dismisses Trump as ‘not serious’ on the economy in MSNBC interview
item.description: It was her first solo interview with a national network as the Democratic presidential nominee.

item.title: Pink Cocaine as an Emerging Drug Threat from Latin America

item.title: Labor unions prepare for battle against Trump’s federal workforce plans

item.title: Palo Alto Networks Full-Year Guidance Disappoints; Shares Slip
item.description: Palo Alto Networks raised its outlook for the year and said revenue climbed in its fiscal first quarter fueled by further subscription growth.

item.title: Harris is pounding Trump on fascism. Some Dems think that’s a mistake.
item.description: Harris has ratcheted up her warnings about the dangers of a second Trump term in recent weeks.

item.title: RFK Jr. weighs major changes to how Medicare pays physicians

item.description: Find insight on Paramount, Netflix, Nvidia and more in the latest Market Talks covering technology, media and telecom

item.title: Apple Offers $100 Million Investment in Indonesia to Lift iPhone 16 Ban
item.description: The amount the U.S. tech giant has offered is 10 times higher than an initial plan to invest $10 million and will be invested over the next two years.

item.title: There’s a Reason Harris’ Campaign Is Locked in on Quick Fixes
item.description: The Democratic nominee isn’t campaigning much on the Biden administration’s bigger, slower-moving policies.

item.title: Democratic Sen. Bob Casey concedes Pennsylvania race to Dave McCormick
Janet Yellen Defends Her Record – and Delivers a Warning
item.description: The Treasury secretary is defending her legacy — and warning that the stability of the U.S. economy is at stake.

item.title: Trump’s pick for attorney general previously served on his impeachment defense team

item.title: Google Should Be Forced to Sell Chrome Browser, Justice Department Says
item.description: The spinoff would be a major blow to the tech giant and will likely kick off a legal fight with wide-reaching implications for its core business.
